bf1184f8-a705-4e5e-a355-8716941b6189 | lsc = | icon = }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}. == Background == The estate of the wealthy [[Valera Family]] of Vailia. Recently, in response to their [[Family Pride|financial situation]], they have taken to lodging passers-by in the quarters upstairs, assuming they have the coin of course. ==Points of interest== ;Lower floor * The floor is dominated by the great hall (with a hidden book containing two scrolls) connecting to a small kitchen and the scribe's office. ;Upper floor * The upper floor contains the bedrooms for the members of the Valera family and their hired hands. ==Characters== '''Lower floor:''' * [[Scribe]] * [[Orso Valera]], assuming he survives [[Salt in the Wound]]. '''Upper floor:''' * [[Atello Valera]], patriarch of the family. * [[Martino Valera]], brother of Orso. ==Gallery== PE2_Valera_Estate_Exterior.png | Building exterior PE2 Valera Crest.png | Valera family crest above the entrance.
